about_the_game:
◆Can you spot the Ecchi girl coming to the idol audition!?◆


It's finally starting!
New idol audition!

Evaluate the 1 million different girls who come for interviews and form your favorite idol group!

However, there are rumors that there is an "Ecchi girl" among the applicants!?

Find a neat girl in a limited time!!

◆“I want to do something naughty during the interview…”◆


By repeating interviews and live performances, your manager level will increase and you will be able to give naughty instructions during interviews!

Check out her underwear...
Using sex toys...

◆ Live start with naughty appearance!! ◆


The live performance will begin immediately after the interview.

After finishing the interview in a naughty outfit, the girl goes on stage as she is...
This is the ultimate abuse of power.

Well, producer...it looks like the first girl has arrived!!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains sexual content.
It is possible to engage in non-consensual sexual acts with female characters appearing in the game.
Sexual toys can also be used on female characters in the game.
There is a scene in which a female character stands on stage in a sexually explicit manner, including nakedness.
All characters are over 18 years old.

name: HENTAI Audition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Discern the girls coming to the interview!?" You're an idol producer! Sift through a million girls at the interviews and take on the debut live. As your level increases, so does the potential for abuse of power...
supported_languages:
English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
